channel.title: Kryptix
channel.description:
I used to be in some group which allowed me to change my avatar and stuff but when the RSC section got changed to MoparRSC I think it got removed. It'd be nice to be able to change it again as I'm a bit bored of this one now.
Also, how does one go about getting a rank? It seems all the RSC people with ranks are inactive and haven't posted in months/years.

item.title: Kryptix
item.dc:creator: @mod_taharok Taharok
item.description:
@mod_taharok wrote:

Well, I hate to say it, but I guess I have to mark this as resolved. There’s nothing to be done, after what happened…

Read full topic

item.title: Kryptix
item.dc:creator: @mod_taharok Taharok
item.description:
@mod_taharok wrote:

[quote=“Kryptix, post:4, topic:444147”][quote author=Taharok link=topic=546830.msg4010891#msg4010891 date=1339195578]
Do you have an idea what you want for the avatar? I can switch it for you.
[/quote]
Cheers dude. What’s the max width/height and file size please?[/quote]

Don’t worry about a file size. I don’t think there’s really a set limit on avatars (and I’m a bit lazy to go and check atm). As far as dimensions, I think it auto fits to the size that my avatar is right now (rectangularly).

Read full topic

item.title: Kryptix
item.dc:creator: @Kryptix Kryptix
item.description:

Taharok:

Do you have an idea what you want for the avatar? I can switch it for you.

Cheers dude. What’s the max width/height and file size please?

item.title: Kryptix
item.dc:creator: @davidi2 Davidi2
item.description:
@davidi2 wrote:

I don’t know about your avatar. Someone more veteran than myself may know, you may want to go straight to Moparisthebest if nobody else knows.

As for getting a rank, self-nomination is not allowed in this section, but I think you and I both know why you haven’t gotten one as-of-yet. It may have been a while ago, but it still has impact, and to be frank it would just cause too much controversy.

Read full topic
